channel.title: Just Finished A TUTORIAL... Ready to Start My Actuall Client (Need Help)
channel.description:
Hey first im going to start off by saying i have just finished this tutorial:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342685.0.html
^ And now i am ready to start my own actually client as in the one's that people need to download in order to play and i need a bit of help getting it set up and ready for me to start scripting/coding it so if anyone could help me it would be very much appreciated thanks in advance.
To make it easier for you guys to understand what im talking about since im a newb at this server/client stuff basically what i mean is this.
- Start my actuall Client/Server. - Learn the basics of Coding/Scripting. - Start me off with what i need for it and tell me my first few steps.
*NOTE* - I HAVE TeamViewer so it might be easier to help me.

item.title: Just Finished A TUTORIAL... Ready to Start My Actuall Client (Need Help)
item.dc:creator: @Yshlaw Yshlaw
item.description:
@Yshlaw wrote:

[quote=“heroisgay, post:26, topic:286195”][quote author=Yshlaw link=topic=378528.msg2847168#msg2847168 date=1246343303]
Ok well if you don’t feel like explaining via helping me why attempt to help if i get lost that makes no sense you expect me to know exactly what ur talking about if i have no idea what i am doing? and you won’t explain[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 30, 2009, 12:30:17 am[/size][hr][quote author=Mod Skill09 link=topic=378528.msg2847150#msg2847150 date=1246342768]
In case you are still having trouble

  1. Download Mopar client here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/moparscape.html
  2. Learn Servers BEFORE clients
  3. Go to Server Downloads
  4. Download a ‘317’ server(preferably one without client)
  5. After Downloading Extract the Files, Using WinRaR
    6)If you correctly followed the tutorial that you said, you should have jdk1.6.0_14, so open your server folder and look for ‘run.bat’ and replace the code with this:

@echo off
title your server name
echo Executing your server
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\java.exe” server
pause
exit

Good Luck
[/quote]

I will try this since im pretty sure i will be able to figure these steps out … do you have msn for when i am done this and need help actually starting to code/script the server?
[/quote]

I didn’t feal like explaining because its in the topic. If you would stop asking for ppl to hand everything to you and try to do something for a change you’d learn something.[/quote]

well since i don’t know what the Censored im doing that’s why im asking for detailed help if u Censored listen to my topic

Read full topic
item.source: Just Finished A TUTORIAL... Ready to Start My Actuall Client (Need Help)

item.title: Just Finished A TUTORIAL... Ready to Start My Actuall Client (Need Help)
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Skill09 Mod Skill09
item.description:
@Mod_Skill09 wrote:

For those who do not know what the Java coding conventions is, here is an example.

It’s neater coding, makes it easier to read.

Here is a messy command:

if command.equalsIgnoreCase(“cmd name”); { addItem(“ID, AMOUNT”); sendMessage(“sent you a message”); }

Here is the same command following the java coding conventions:

if command.equalsIgnoreCase(“cmd name”); {
addItem(“ID, AMOUNT”);
sendMessage(“Sent you a message”);
}

Indent new lines[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 30, 2009, 12:32:11 am[/size][hr][quote=“Yshlaw, post:24, topic:286195”]Ok well if you don’t feel like explaining via helping me why attempt to help if i get lost that makes no sense you expect me to know exactly what ur talking about if i have no idea what i am doing? and you won’t explain[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 30, 2009, 12:30:17 am[/size][hr][quote author=Mod Skill09 link=topic=378528.msg2847150#msg2847150 date=1246342768]
In case you are still having trouble

  1. Download Mopar client here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/moparscape.html
  2. Learn Servers BEFORE clients
  3. Go to Server Downloads
  4. Download a ‘317’ server(preferably one without client)
  5. After Downloading Extract the Files, Using WinRaR
    6)If you correctly followed the tutorial that you said, you should have jdk1.6.0_14, so open your server folder and look for ‘run.bat’ and replace the code with this:

@echo off
title your server name
echo Executing your server
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\java.exe” server
pause
exit

Good Luck
[/quote]

I will try this since im pretty sure i will be able to figure these steps out … do you have msn for when i am done this and need help actually starting to code/script the server?[/quote]

I can help you can code your server if you like, but the steps I told you is JUST to get your server running

my msn is: skillscape_servers@hotmail.com

Read full topic

item.description:
@wolfs_goal wrote:

[quote=“heroisgay, post:2, topic:286195”][ul][list]
[li]How to start a server tut - Finished[/li][/list]
[list][li]Java Conventions[/li]
[li]Basic tutorials[/li]
[/list]

I’d say do that if this is actually what you want to do.

Look through the tutorial list for any basic tutorials that can help you if you don’t want to mess up too often. I’m sure there are tuts on things you need to know if you look for them.[/ul][/quote]

I don’t even know what a java convention is…I never used them and I know some pretty good coding…But I would like to know what they are…

item.description:

[quote=“heroisgay, post:6, topic:286195”][quote author=Yshlaw link=topic=378528.msg2847066#msg2847066 date=1246339111]

NOTE - I HAVE TeamViewer so it might be easier to help me.
[/quote]Just saying TeamViewer is a no no. First off make sure you created the server successfully and use the silabsoft client at silabsoft.org. Than move onto your own client. That’s my suggestion.

Hey sorry i didn’t know Teamviewer wasn’t aloud here sorry dude im new. but anyways basically if that’s the case idk how to do that and that’s the help i am looking for because idk what i am doing.

First off what is it you don’t know how to do. Secondly, if you search through the forums for a tutorial on what you don’t know, i’m pretty sure you’ll find something to help you. If not post in the help section.[/quote]

Basically making my own server on that silabsoft thingy and making my client or whatever lol.

Read full topic
